page.title: 02My Family
page.content: {My dad, Christopher.}He is a tubby man. He likes going to sleep after his lunch or dinner. He's a photographer and he enjoys it very much. When we have visitors they ask my dad to do his gorilla. He puts his knuckles on the ground and just drags his whole body along over the floor. His favourite food is Chinese. And he loves tractors.{My mum, Beryl.}She is very fussy and tidy; she hates messy houses. She likes to spin she goes to many guild meetings and is popular with her jumpers. Also she likes dress making. Nearly all her clothes are made by her. When she was young she used to do hair dressing.{Me, Hayley}I like to cook, skate, draw and I like shoes. People say I am very much like my Dad; hardly any lip, chubby and no-one takes me seriously.
